title: Rebrand to Alex Health + stronger landing-page marketing + polished post-login UI

requirements.text: Rebrand the product name to "Alex Health" across the unauthenticated landing page, authenticated app shell (header/nav), and HTML metadata so the name is consistent in all visible UI and browser surfaces (e.g., page title, headings, logo alt text).
acceptanceCriteria: Landing page header shows "Alex Health" instead of any previous name.
Authenticated header/app shell shows "Alex Health" instead of any previous name.
frontend/index.html <title> is updated to include "Alex Health" and reflects a professional marketing title.
No user-facing text shows the old product name.

requirements.text: Enhance the unauthenticated front page (landing) with additional professional marketing content focused on dieting and exercising, including concrete examples of plans and documentation (e.g., sample meal-plan structure, workout-plan structure, and what users will track/log) and clear value propositions about improving lifestyle outcomes.

quotes: show more examples on the front page of dieting and exercising
really markets how we can change the way people live their life with our plans and documentation for a healthy thriving life

acceptanceCriteria: Landing page includes at least 2 distinct sections that explicitly cover dieting and exercising with example plan formats (not just generic statements).
Landing page includes at least one section describing the "plans + documentation" workflow in clear, user-facing English (what gets planned, what gets logged, and what users get back from it).
Landing page keeps a single primary CTA to log in and remains visually consistent with the rest of the site.

requirements.text: Apply a cohesive, professional visual theme across the landing page and authenticated app UI (typography scale, spacing, component styling, and a consistent accent color direction) to make the product feel "really beautiful" without introducing new app features.

quotes: when they login have everything be easy to use and really beautiful

acceptanceCriteria: Landing page and authenticated views share consistent styling for headings, cards, buttons, and section spacing.
UI remains readable and polished in both light and dark modes.
No changes are made to read-only component sources under frontend/src/components/ui; styling is achieved via composition and app-level styles.

requirements.text: Improve post-login usability and visual polish in the authenticated app shell and key views by refining navigation clarity, layout hierarchy, and empty/loading states so the app is easy to use immediately after login (desktop and mobile).

quotes: when they login have everything be easy to use and really beautiful

acceptanceCriteria: Authenticated header/nav is visually polished and clearly indicates the current section on both desktop and mobile.
Primary actions in core areas (e.g., logging/reminders) are easy to discover without adding new backend features.
Views present professional empty states (when there is no data yet) and non-jarring loading states.

constraints: Do not edit files in frontend immutablePaths (e.g., frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts(x), frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui).
Do not introduce new backend canisters or external services; keep the existing single-actor Motoko backend unchanged unless strictly required for UI polish (not expected for this request).
nonGoals: Do not add new tracking domains (e.g., paid plans, messaging, coaching chat, real-time features).
Do not implement third-party authentication beyond Internet Identity.
Do not add new backend data models for “plans”; the request is satisfied via marketing examples and UI/UX polish, not new plan-management functionality.

edits: Update the app icon to reflect the "Alex Health" brand with a clean, professional health/fitness look (app-icon.dim_512x512.png > app-icon.dim_512x512.png)
Adjust the hero banner to better match the new "Alex Health" marketing story (dieting + exercise) while staying professional and modern (hero-banner.dim_1600x600.png > hero-banner.dim_1600x600.png)
